#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N = 2222;
const int MOD = 1000000007;

int T;
int n, m;
bool a[N][N], ok[N];

void dfs(int u){
    ok[u] = false;
    for (int v = 1; v <= n; ++v){
        if (ok[v] && a[v][u]){
            dfs(v);
        }
    }
}

int power(int x, int t){
    if (t == 0)
        return 1;
    int ans = power(x, t/2);
    ans = (1ll * ans * ans) % MOD;
    if (t&1) ans = (1ll*ans * x) % MOD;
    return ans;
}

int main(){
//    freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T--) {
        scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
        memset(a, false, sizeof a);
        memset(ok, true, sizeof ok);
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i){
            int u, v;
            scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);
            int mid = (u+v)/2;
            for (int j = u; j <= mid; ++j){
                if (a[j][v-j+u] == false){
                    a[j][v-j+u] = true;
                    a[v-j+u][j] = true;
                } else break;
            }
        }
        int cnt = 0;
        for (int u = 1; u <= n; ++u)
            if (ok[u]){
                ++cnt;
                dfs(u);
            }
//        cout << cnt << endl;
        printf("%d\n", power(26, cnt));
    }
}
